info.name: Youtube Bottom Gray Shadow
info.description: changes a white shadow background of the Youtube Player's bottom to the gray color and adds some additional shadows to the bottom controls to increase note: the progress bar is not changed this style is compatible with the style Youtube Controls Highlighting and Youtube Progress Bar Highlighting
